name: Celestial Dress Up
description:
• Created for Magical Girl Game Jam 7 (Starry Theme!)
  • Amazing Sound Designer: lisamichele
  • Recommend you play Fullscreen (hit the 'Fullscreen' Button Twice)
  • Unavailable on Mobile Devices
  • [Play my other Dress Up Games Here]
  • Feel free to share pictures of your characters in the comments- I want to see them!

(Mac) Hold: Shift >Command>3

(PC) Press the 'Windows' Key and search "Snipping Tool" + New Snip
